verbose_text: When binding with TrkA, NGF becomes phosphorylated and acts as a binding site for specific signaling protein such as phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase (PI3K)/Akt, which phosphorylates Bad (BCL2 associated agonist of cell death), leading to inhibition of apoptosis pathway [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: phosphorylates Bad (BCL2-associated agonist of cell death
